amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for Thermoplastic Composite Body Armor research.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4767 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4767 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S8713-8714; text: CR S8713) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for Thermoplastic Composite Body Armor research.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4767 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sessions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4767 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
